Package com.paypal.selion.grid.servlets

A collection of servlets that are injected into the Grid to provide customized behavior that is specific to SeLion.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GridAutoUpgradeDelegateServlet
    This RegistryBasedServlet servlet is responsible for getting the following information from a Grid admin, and relaying it to each of the nodes, so that they may go about gracefully upgrading themselves once they are done with servicing any of the tests that are already running.
    GridForceRestartDelegateServlet
    This RegistryBasedServlet based servlet is responsible for sending restart requests to all the registered nodes.
    ListAllNodes
    This is simple RegistryBasedServlet servlet which basically display the list of nodes connected to the grid.
    LoginServlet
    This plain vanilla servlet is responsible for supporting login/logout and display of the main page.
    PasswordChangeServlet  
    SauceConfigChangeServlet
    This RegistryBasedServlet based servlet update the Sauce Configuration json file based on the input provided via POST operation and re-load the SauceConfigReader proerties.
    SauceServlet
    This RegistryBasedServlet based servlet automatically takes care of spinning off a virtual node when it gets initialized.
    TransferServlet
    TransferServlet is used for processing HTTP POST upload requests to SeLion grid.

Package com.paypal.selion.grid.servlets Description

A collection of servlets that are injected into the Grid to provide customized behavior that is specific to SeLion.
